basic_info.description: I am an iOS Developer who is passionate about finding the best solutions for day to day problems and realizing a vision through iOS applications. I create features and applications for products in Swift. I’ve developed apps from scratch to launch, developed features to enhance already available products for higher downloads and engagement and I’d love to work with you.

projects.title: Nabd - video feed
projects.description: Developed and integrated a major feature of a video feed which aggregates news related videos from all your subscriptions and display in a gallery like format

projects.title: Habit Tracker
projects.description: An application to track your habits and guide you towards a healthy lifestyle in SwiftUI

projects.title: Banchar Towing App
projects.description: An application for an on-demand towing service for cars on the road. Completed this as a project in a hackathon I had participated in

projects.title: Image Filter App
projects.description: Image Filtering application using CoreImage's built-in filter library and image processing APIs in Swift & SwiftUI
